item.title: Stock Market Timing Signals
item.description: About the system The Stock Market Timing (SMT) system aims to time entries and exits in the SPY ETF adopting a medium to long term investment style. The criteria for investment are a mix of quantitative tests and discretionary decisions. Quantitative methods include backtesting of rule-based strategies and statistical analysis of historical price movements. Discretionary decisions gauge the quantitative elements in the light of macroeconomic cycles, political events and money management.
